title: Episode 40 w/ DJ Envy & Angela Yee
itunes:title: Episode 40 w/ DJ Envy & Angela Yee
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with DJ Envy and Angela Yee of the Breakfast Club. In the midst of several shots of Tiger Bone they talk about how the Breakfast Club came to be, the origins of N.O.R.E. and Envy's 30k beef, Angela Yee's drinking stamina and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
